sourcesContent:
import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import style from './Profile.module.css'; import { Card } from "./Profile.styled"; export const Profile = ({ username, tag, location, avatar, stats }) => { return (

{username}

@{tag}

{location}

  • Followers {stats.followers}
  • Views {stats.views}
  • Likes {stats.likes}
) } Profile.propTypes = { username: PropTypes.string.isRequired, tag: PropTypes.string.isRequired, location: PropTypes.string.isRequired, avatar: PropTypes.string.isRequired, stats: PropTypes.objectOf(PropTypes.number) }
